conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B and C.
Predict which container (D or E) it will flow into after passing through baffles.
Point A is at the top left, Point B is at the top center, Point C is at the top right.
Container D is at the bottom left, Container E is at the bottom right.
There are slanted barriers: orange, yellow, red, grey, and brown.

premise: Point A is at the top left, Point B is at the top center, Point C is at the top right.
conclusion: Liquid flows downward from points A, B, and C.

premise: Liquid flows downward from point A.
conclusion: Liquid from point A flows downward and to the left.

premise: Liquid flows downward from point B.
conclusion: Liquid from point B flows downward and to the right.

premise: Liquid flows downward from point C.
conclusion: Liquid from point C flows downward and to the left.

premise: Liquid from point A flows downward and to the left.
conclusion: Liquid from point A will pass through the brown baffle.

premise: Liquid from point B flows downward and to the right.
conclusion: Liquid from point B will pass through the red baffle.

premise: Liquid from point C flows downward and to the left.
conclusion: Liquid from point C will pass through the yellow baffle.

premise: Liquid from point A will pass through the brown baffle.
conclusion: Liquid from point A will eventually reach container D.

premise: Liquid from point B will pass through the red baffle.
conclusion: Liquid from point B will eventually reach container E.

premise: Liquid from point C will pass through the yellow baffle.
conclusion: Liquid from point C will eventually reach container D.

premise: Liquid from points A and C will eventually reach container D.
conclusion: Liquid from points A and C will flow into container D.

premise: Liquid from point B will eventually reach container E.
conclusion: Liquid from point B will flow into container E.

premise: Liquid from points A and C will flow into container D. Liquid from point B will flow into container E.
conclusion: Liquid from A and C will flow into container D. Liquid from B will flow into container E.
